Generate fake images of getting loot.

**Usage**

- `/fake type:<string> username:<string>`

**Parameters**

| Name | Type | Required | Description | Choices |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| `type` | `string` | Yes | The type you want to generate. | 6 options (see autocomplete) |
| `username` | `string` | Yes | The username to put on the image. | - |
